Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AimingAction
    A class which represents action to aim at a target.
    AmmunitionBox
    A class which represents the ammunition box.
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Behaviours
    A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> that does not allow nulls to be added.
    ChantingAction
    Represents the chanting action of priestess, Mambo Marie.
    Club
    A class which represents a club crafted from a zombie’s dropped arm.
    CompoundMapFactory
    Factory for creating compound map.
    CraftWeaponAction
    A class which represents action for crafting zombie arm or leg into club or mace.
    Crop
    Represents all crops in the Zombie game world.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatingAction
    A class which represents an action to eat food.
    EatingBehaviour
    A class that generates an EatingBehaviour if the current Actor who has less than half of his hit point, is standing in a location which has a food.
    Farmer
    Represents farmers in the Zombie game world.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseAction
    Special class for FertiliseAction so that the Farmer can fertilise an unripe crop and shorten the time needed for crop to ripe.
    FertiliseBehaviour
    Class the generates a FertiliseAction if Farmer is standing on a unripe crop.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    Represents food in the Zombie game world.
    GrowlAction
    Special action for Zombie to growl, i.e.
    GrowlBehaviour
    Class that generates a GrowlAction for Zombie.
    HarvestAction
    Special action for Farmer and Player to harvest ripe crops.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class that generates a HarvestAction so that the Actor can harvest ripe crops for food when he stands on or next to the ripe crop.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanAttackAction
    Special class which represents action taken by alive actors (Human/Player) to attack undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie).
    HumanCorpse
    Represents the human corpse in the Zombie game world.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Limb
    A class which represents the limb that drops off from the Zombie
    LongRangedWeapon
    A base class for long-ranged weapons.
    Mace
    A class which represents a mace crafted from a zombie's dropped leg.
    PickUpItemBehaviour
    A class that generates an PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a location which has weapon.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Priestess
    Represents the priestess, which is the source of the local zombie epidemic in the zombie game world.
    QuitGameAction
    Special class for Player to quit the game voluntarily.
    RefillBulletAction
    A class which represents an action to refill bullets of a weapon.
    ShootingAction
    A class which represents shooting action which allows player to choose shooting direction from a sub menu and results in area effect damage to more than one target based on specific miss chance.
    ShortRangedWeapon
    A base class for short-ranged weapons.
    Shotgun
    A class which represents a shotgun.
    SniperRifle
    A class which represents a sniper rifle.
    SnippingAction
    A class which represents sniping action which perform attack to specific target using specific miss chance and damage.
    SowingAction
    Special class for the Farmer to sow a crop.
    SowingBehaviour
    Class the generates a SowingAction if the Farmer is standing next to a Dirt.
    SuitableLocation
    This class is responsible for finding a suitable location to add an Actor onto a map.
    TownMapFactory
    Factory for creating town map.
    TravelAction
    Represents the Player’s action to travel between the compound map and town map.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    UseSniperAction
    A class which represents action for an actor to use a sniper rifle, by providing a sub menu for actor to choose a target from the actor's current map and after choosing a target, provide another sub menu for actor to choose action to perform on the target, either aiming at target or shoot at target.
    Vehicle
    Represents the vehicle that is used for Player to travel between different maps.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    This is a class representing a zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieAttackAction
    Special class which represents action taken by undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie) to attack alive actors (Human/Player) .
    ZombieGameMap
    Class that represents the game map in the Zombie game world.
    ZombieGameMapFactory
    Class that defines the models (size, terrain, actors etc.) of the maps in the Zombie game world.
    ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
    Represents the intrinsic weapons of Zombie, e.g.
    ZombieWorld
    Class that represents the Zombie game world.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZombieCapability
    Class that handles all enumerations used in the game.
